Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the New York city housing authority
Summary: Imposes certain governance and reporting requirements on the New York city housing authority; requires the establishment of a training program for board members of NYCHA; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, Pub Hous L; amd ยง1678, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the public authorities law, in relation to the New York city housing authority
